attributes.action: Remove the right of local councils to impose parking fines and restore the police control of parking and traffic wardens.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The recent switch from police control to private control of parking and clamping has resulted in a situation where a private idividual can have a parking charge or a clamp fitted to a car when that car is correctly parked. The Parking Attendants are encouraged to issue charges.
